QuestData.Title: Going on the Offensive
QuestData.Description: Ha! So my father just wasted twenty years of our lives on a fool's errand!$b$bI'm taking charge.$b$bWhen Tyrande sent us here she was very specific that we not come back until we find the source of the Light that she saw in her visions. It's obvious now that the Pools of Youth were not it.$b$bWe are pressing westward and could use your help.$b$bMeet us at the Sentinel Basecamp further west when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lyalia at the Sentinel Basecamp in the Krasarang Wilds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lyalia at the Sentinel Basecamp in the Krasarang Wilds.
